marker.title: Spoons' Farms
marker.info:
Spoons' Farms

1x Large Scarecrow Farm
1x Small Scarecrow Garden

marker.title: Terminal and Hunter's
marker.info:
Trotsky's Farm, Jaest's Farm, and Terminal's Loom.

2x Small Scarecrow Garden
1x Private Loom

marker.title: Solis Seaside Mine
marker.info: Holy shit, look at all the rocks. If there's less than a dozen people here, you're lucky.

marker.title: Ironclaw Mine
marker.info:
Ironclaw Mine

Nice mine, be careful of fall damage.

marker.title: Mahadevi Iron
marker.info: There's 4 iron rocks hidden here. Good if you can't get anything else.

marker.title: Granite Quarry
marker.info:
Granite Quarry

Has more than just granite, there's iron amongst the unknown ores.
